name: 王建評
objective:
本課程由機械工程的角度出發，結合基礎電化學原理，介紹燃料電池的基本原理及種類，由最新市場發展現況導入，介紹燃料電池的發展歷史及最新現況，同時說明提升燃料電池效率及壽命的關鍵影響因素，結合實作方式深入了解燃料電池特性。

This class explains basic principles and classifications of fuel cell from mechanical aspect.
Current development and history of the fuel cell will be introduce in the next step. Finally, how to improve cell efficiency and lifetime are the most important topics. Simple experiments will be implemented in the class to help student understand.
